articles.title: Soundarya Soundararajan
articles.contents:
Soundarya Soundararajan
          
          
            
              I am a Double Doc (Medicine & Ph.D.) living in Ahmedabad, India.
              I am an absolute R lover; I visualize data even in my dreams!! I use R for exploratory data analysis, data visualization and reproducible research. I am a proud advocate of OpenScience!
            
            
              I am a Double Doc (Medicine & Ph.D.) living in Ahmedabad, India.
